website_summaries.verdict: Made of 90% beef, this dehydrated dog food preserves all of the nutrition and flavor that gets cooked out of traditional foods.
pros: Contains pumpkin and all of your dog’s essential vitamins and nutrients
Great for dogs of all sizes
cons: On the more expensive side for dog food

customer_reviews.title: Real Beef
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this treat . I think that it can be offered as a food instead of kibble , but I use it with their kibble sometimes and they cant wait ! .Also I train my dogs in different events and this product is by far the very best for a training reward. I buy a bag monthly !
customer_reviews.author: Tequila20

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I buy this expensive dog food because my dog Loves it, but this seller send me the food all in crumbs almost all the food was powder.Not buying another.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Size of pieces too big
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the quality of this product for teaching my dogs, the pieces are much too large. So I spend tons of time just tearing each rectangle into little pieces to get some mileage out of my teaching sessions. When teaching, we need to deliver quickly so tearing them as we train takes too much time. Is there any chance you could produce pieces that are very small squares such as 1/4 inch x 1/4 inch?
customer_reviews.author: Barb Calhoon

customer_reviews.title: Great for treating
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy this directly from their website, but it wouldn't go through. Luckily I found it online and my dog loves it. I use it mostly as high value treats, but also mix it into his food at times. I like that it is a natural product and is good for my dog. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Good food, but overpriced on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this food last month for my dog, which he loves. However, the price has gone up by five dollars per bag. I was able to purchase locally for 20% less. Disappointed that Amazon is not able to compete.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Liming

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: All natural. We use it for training treats. By the end of the bag there is a lot of crumbled meat. But the dogs still lick it all up.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. U.

customer_reviews.title: Dog started getting tear stains
customer_reviews.text: My dog weeps a lot and we are very rigid with her food. As soon as I added this to her diet she started getting that rusted iron color tear stains around her eye. She loves the food and stool was fine but I have to switch back to the competition. Granted I only tried the beef flavor. I may try the poultry version in a small bag in the future. Too bad since I bought two bags of the beef. Oh well, the neighbors black lab loved it
customer_reviews.author: Zack R.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately have to change my review to 3 stars. My dogs only like this the very first day and quickly ignored it. They won't even touch it now. But they keep going back to their Ziwi Peak. This seems to be quality dog food, but I guess it's just not my dogs favorite. It's worth a try, but Ziwi is much better and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: They love it so I only need to use a small ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these as training treats for my dogs. They love it so I only need to use a small amount to reinforce behavior. The treats are a bit crumbly so keep it in a small container or plastic bag if putting them in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Terri PhD

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes absolutely bonkers for these high quality treats and I feel good knowing that they are not loaded with nasty chemicals and fake ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: S.E.F.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: My 2 y/o toy and 14 y/o miniature poodle both thrive on this food. Easy peasy to serve, travels well. Nice "clean" food that my dogs enjoy and I trust. It doubles well as a treat
customer_reviews.author: Angela G

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs LOVE this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE this!!!! The trainer suggested we give this a try but warned it was on the high side. We have 2 Aussies we are training and we finally found a treat they will do just about anything for!!! It's definitely the smell all things stop when that bag opens up. So it may be a bit on the high side but worth every penny if you have a couple of smarty-pants on your hands. It will last a while if you break it up into smaller pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P

customer_reviews.title: Careful, it has mold!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand for 2 years. My last purchase, delivered on 11/1 is showing mold. Yuk! Had to toss out 1 whole bag. Hope the next bag doesn't get moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: High value treat for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Our dog really loves these, so we use it as a high value treat when we call his name if he comes, or other times when we really want to reward him.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weideman

customer_reviews.title: Real beef
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loves those delicious real beef or meat, whatever it is. He gets sooo excited by looking at the bag alone : )
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Moldy upon arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, but very moldy! Gross! And I can't return it. Very disappointed! I've purchased them b4 and never had a problem but this is completely unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: My finicky dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say other than my finicky dogs love it. We've tried the lamb and chicken, they both prefer the beef flavor.
customer_reviews.author: 4tre66

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: At first my dog like but now he does not eat that much, also it has too many carbs, my dog has reaction to carbs because he has yeast infection before
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Felix

customer_reviews.title: It’s healthy
customer_reviews.text: I have picky doxies one likes it one will eat it sometimes I know it’s healthy
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Martin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this
customer_reviews.text: It came in all crumbled up almost all powder. I wanted to use as a training rewards but its unusable..
customer_reviews.author: pras

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: All my dog's have to hear is the rattle of this bag opening and I have their full attention!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this. We use for training and mix it in with her food. It is kind of like jerky and comes in various sized squares. Sometimes the pieces are large and you need to break them up.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Hynds

customer_reviews.title: Finally a food my dog will eat! He is so picky, and it’s this better than any other food.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a food my dog will eat! He is so picky, and it’s this better than any other food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product smells strong and my dog doesn't care for it. He likes the venison much better
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Best Treats Ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't feed as dog food but use as dog treats. My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dendria D. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loves these...but now I buy from chewy . com... because it is fresher
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treat
customer_reviews.text: My little dogs get excited when I get out this package.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect food. The dogs love it and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I feed raw and when I travel, this is the perfect food. The dogs love it and it is easy to travel with and feed
customer_reviews.author: C. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Have used it for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and it's good for them. I use it as an additive with their regular food. Super expensive for the amount in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: KatRead28

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: about half of the bag was crumbly the rest of the bag seemed a little more dry compared to the previous bag I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Braze F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for treats!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me at my dog's training classes to be used as treats during class. Great quality, and my dog loves them. Only complaint is that it crumbles very easily and theres more crumbs than whole pieces at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treats for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Well , I can’t attest to the flavor , but my dog loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Boggiatto

customer_reviews.title: All Dogs Love This Food!
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list is favorable, the size and texture of product works. Ad best of all, All Dogs Do Love This Food!
customer_reviews.author: tone blevins

customer_reviews.title: My Chihuahuas love this food!  90% meat!  Just wish the company would make tiny bites again!😊
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best dog foods ever! My Chihuahuas love it. However, I have one complaint. Before recipe was changed, the bites were smaller, something a small breed baby could eat. I still buy the food regularly, but have to break it up. It's like the food is being marketed for larger dogs. Honestly, I wish the company would go back to original recipe & small bites. The food is expensive, so it's kinds ridiculous, I have to break it into tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: dacwilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service.
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy likes it and it is good for him...win win
customer_reviews.author: R. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Great beef treats!
customer_reviews.text: Great real beef treats that are made in the USA that my pup loves, with none of the soy, wheat, corn (crappy stuff) that are fillers. Cut into squares and doesn't smell bad. For the $$, best deal out there for beef treats.
customer_reviews.author: scott futagaki

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.  I buy them over and over again
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product with quality ingredients. Dogs love them. I don't use as a food but as a training treat. Sized just right for my 50 to 65 lbs Malinois. The "chips" of food can be broken into smaller pieces if desired but the chip is substantial enough one can toss a handful into a coat pocket without them turning to dust. In a jean pocket them would crumble however. For two pounds this is a great price compared to those tiny bags of "dog jerky' treats that are $8 to $15 for 3 to 4 oz.
customer_reviews.author: MalinoisLover

customer_reviews.title: not big chunks like shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Came in crumbles, not big chunks like shown in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality food!
customer_reviews.text: This is great dogfood! Nutritional breakdown is excellent - its "dry" food that looks/feels more like small soft strips of jerky so easy to feed even when travelling - no mess! AND my dogs love all three "flavors". Its on the pricey side but cost is in line with other high quality/high protein dog foods. Luckily my dogs are toy size so I can afford to give them their favorite food more often!
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: This is good food I only for young active dogs
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer feed this food because as my dog gets older he doesn't need that much fat, his pancreas lever was higher than normal. So he now is on straight homemade raw food only...It a good food for young active dogs...not saying its a bad food its just not for older dogs or dogs that have weight problems
customer_reviews.author: Annie Beaumont

product_meta.title: Real Meat Air-Dried Dog Food, Beef
product_meta.description: Size:2 lb| Color:dark brownReal Meat’s gentle air-drying process delivers a high-quality, high-meat-content food, while maintaining the nutritional integrity of the natural raw materials. Since 2003 dogs and cats have been indulging in our delicious and healthy all natural treats. Each serving contains over 90 per cent of nutritious air-dried free-range meat and organs, in a highly digestible form for optimum health
feature_bullets: A Complete Balanced Meat And Organic Food With Added Vitamins And Minerals
Feed As Sole Diet Or Mix With Any Other Food For An Extra-Tasty Meal.
Easy Substitute For Any Raw Or Frozen Diet, Easy To Serve For Pets On The Go.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
